item.title: RootMeCTF
item.description: RootMe CTF Here’s a Link to the room. First, I’m going to add the ip address of the machine to my /etc/hosts folder for ease of access. echo target-ip rootme >> /etc/hosts Next, it’s time for some reconnaissance. Reconnaissance nmap -sC -sV -T4 -oN nmap.txt rootme Starting Nmap 7.60 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-12-20 21:29 GMT Nmap scan report for rootme (10.10.24.110) Host is up (0.050s latency). Not shown: 932 closed ports, 66 filtered ports PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 7.
